channel.title: heat stress on funPlantGenes
channel.description: Recent content in heat stress on funPlantGenes

item.title: CaHsfA2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CaHsfA2 Gene Name: heat stress transcription factor A2 Genome: Species: Capsicum annuum Functional Descriptions: CaHsfA2 was located in the nucleus and had transcriptional activity, consistent with the typical features of Hsfs.

item.title: CaWRKY40
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: CA00g87690 Gene Symbol: CaWRKY40 Gene Name: WRKY family transcription factor44 Genome: Species: Capsicum annuum Functional Description: A conserved double-W box in the promoter of CaWRKY40 mediates autoregulation during response to pathogen attack and heat stress in pepper.

item.title: CaWRKY6
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CaWRKY6 Gene Name: WRKY transcription factor 6 Genome: Species: Capsicum annuum Functional Descriptions: CaWRKY6 transcriptionally activates CaWRKY40, regulates Ralstonia solanacearum resistance, and confers high-temperature and high-humidity tolerance in pepper.

item.title: CmDREB6
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CmDREB6 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Chrysanthemum morifolium Functional Descriptions: Over-expression of chrysanthemum CmDREB6 enhanced tolerance of chrysanthemum to heat stress.

item.title: CmMYB121
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Unigene68526-All Gene Symbol: CmMYB121 Gene Name: MYB transcription factor 121 Genome: Species: Chrysanthemum morifolium Functional Descriptions: Transcription factor CmHSFA4-CmMYBS3 complex enhances salt tolerance in chrysanthemum by repressing CmMYB121 expression.

item.title: CsHSFA1b
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: TEA030860 Gene Symbol: CsHSFA1b Gene Name: Camellia sinensis Heat stress factors A1b Genome: TeaPGDB V1.

item.title: CsHSFA1d
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Csa3G008920 Gene Symbol: CsHSFA1d Gene Name: heat-shock transcription factor HSFA1d Genome: Species: Cucumis sativus Functional Descriptions: Report that heat shock induces cold acclimation in cucumber seedlings, via a process involving the heat-shock transcription factor HSFA1d.

item.title: CsHSFA2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: TEA023633 Gene Symbol: CsHSFA2 Gene Name: Camellia sinensis Heat stress factors A2 Genome: TeaPGDB V1.

item.title: CsIVP
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Cucsa_101020.1 Gene Symbol: CsIVP Gene Name: Irregular Vasculature Patterning Genome: Species: Cucumis sativus Functional Descriptions: CsIVP Modulates Low Nitrogen and High-Temperature Resistance in Cucumber.

item.title: DcHSP17.7
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: DcHSP17.7 Gene Name: heat shock protein17 Genome: P27396 Species: Daucus carota Functional Descriptions: DcHSP17.

item.title: GhHSP24.7
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhHSP24.7 Gene Name: Genome: M-1 reference genome Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: The regulation circuit composed of GhHSP24.

item.title: GhHSP70-26
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gohir.D06G173000 Gene Symbol: GhHSP70-26 Gene Name: Genome: Gossypium hirsutum L.

item.title: Hsf70;hsp70-6
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Zm00001eb012470 Gene Symbol: Hsf70 hsp70-6 ZmHSP70 class A Gene Name: heat shock protein70-6 Genome: Zm-B73-REFERENCE-NAM-5.

item.title: HSFB2b
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.11G025700 Gene Symbol: HSFB2b Gene Name: Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a2_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: HSFB2b improves salt tolerance through the promotion of flavonoid accumulation by activating one subset of flavonoid biosynthesis-related genes and by inhibiting the repressor gene GmNAC2 to release another subset of genes in the flavonoid biosynthesis pathway.

item.title: Hsftf20
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Zm00001eb428800 Gene Symbol: Hsftf20 Gene Name: HSF-transcription factor 20 Genome: Zm-B73-REFERENCE-NAM-5.

item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Zm00001eb242480 Gene Symbol: Hsftf6 Gene Name: HSF-transcription factor 6 Genome: Zm-B73-REFERENCE-NAM-5.

item.title: HSP22
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: HSP22 Gene Name: heat shock protein 22 Genome: Species: Pisum sativum Functional Descriptions: Variability within a pea core collection of LEAM and HSP22, two mitochondrial seed proteins involved in stress tolerance.

item.title: HTH5
item.description: Gene Details: MSU gene ID: LOC_Os05g05740 RAPdb gene ID: Os05g0150000 Gene Symbol: HTH5 Genome: MSU7 , IRGSP-1.

item.title: JrGRAS2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: JrGRAS2 Gene Name: GRAS TF 2 Genome: Species: Juglans regia Functional Descriptions: JrGRAS2 improves plant HT tolerance involving in HSP expression.

item.title: LEAM
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: LEAM Gene Name: late embryogenesis abundant protein Genome: Species: Pisum sativum Functional Descriptions: Variability within a pea core collection of LEAM and HSP22, two mitochondrial seed proteins involved in stress tolerance.

item.title: LeCDJ1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: LeCDJ1 Gene Name: DnaJ protein1 Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: The roles of a tomato (Solanum lycopersicum) chloroplast-targeted DnaJ protein (LeCDJ1), whose expression was upregulated by treatment at 4 and 42 °C, and with high light, NaCl, polyethylene glycol, and H2O2, were investigated here using sense and antisense transgenic tomatoes.

item.title: LePHGPx
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: LePHGPx Gene Name: phospholipid hydroperoxide glutathione peroxidase Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: We have isolated a tomato (Lycopersicon esculentum) gene encoding a phospholipid hydroperoxide glutathione peroxidase (LePHGPx).

item.title: MdHsp70
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MdHsp70 Gene Name: heat shock protein 70 Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: Elongation factor MdEF-Tu coordinates with heat shock protein MdHsp70 to enhance apple thermotolerance.

item.title: MdVQ37

item.title: NtCP2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: NtCP2 Gene Name: cysteine protease 2 Genome: Species: Nicotiana tabacum Functional Descriptions: NtCP2 has a high similarity to KDEL-tailed cysteine proteinases and is expressed in mature green leaves.
